message: Our hosting provider is experiencing issues with their network infrastructure. As a result, all MRSI Wizard products are currently unavailable. We will post any updates here as further informatation becomes available.
title: Network Outage

message: The servers for all of the Wizards will be down late this afternoon (May 16th) for scheduled maintenance starting at 4pm CST until about 6pm CST. File libraries on this site may also be impacted. We apologize for the inconvenience.
title: Server Maintenance

message: The servers for all of the Wizards will be down this Thursday, June 27th starting at 5:00pm CDT due to a scheduled power outage to shore up our backup power systems. The Wizards will not be accessible during the outage, which is expected to last about an hour. We apologize for the inconvenience.
title: Power Outage

message: You may experience intermittent interruptions with the Wizard applications due to our network provider experiencing issues affecting connectivity and power due to severe weather. File libraries on this site may also be impacted.
title: Warning status
